Dead by Daylight is a unique game that is different from PVP. In this game, One can be a killer while the other four can be unlucky survivors to escape each different maps that have different benefits for killers and survivors.

First, let's start off with the survivors. Each survivor has these unique three perks that offers a wide range of benefits. Some might benefit the player, while others might benefit the group as a whole. With that in mind, upgrading the survivor can be a little difficult. You must obtain these "Bloodpoints" in order to upgrade your specific character, In order to get these, you must do certain actions (repairing a generator, finding an ally, escape a chase etc). Each offers ways to obtain this. If you escape the match or rather, live. You get tons of points. Now, let me say this, this forces the player to get out of their comfort zone and risk either getting hooked or stumbling upon a killer (which i've done numerous times). As for the killers, they have their own range of personalities...

The killers offers a range of perks and skills. Each killer has their own unique twist of there "special ability" These killers can range from scream, michael myers, pig face, leather face etc. However, no mater what they have, if you commit to a chase, you will ALWAYS catch up to a survivor because the speed of the killer is insane (however, not a ground breaking game mechanic though). 

Basically this is what i sum up the game...

PROS
- Forces the survivors to work together
- Each survivor and killer has their own unique abilities
- You can also acquire new abilities and items to use through the bloodweb and even has "teachable perks" for other survivors and killers to use
-Each map is different and fresh.
- Stumbling upon crows will let the killer know about your location
- Customizing your survivor and killer is great (to a limit...)
- Each item used or acquire will be lost and has a limit of charges (unless you stacks perks with it to prolong the use)
- Constant updates to the game 
- No weapons. Yes, you CANNOT KILL THE KILLER. You only have support weapons to combat the killer.

CONS
- As a killer, to find a match is literally long (range from 20 to 30 minutes)
- Hacking. I never stumble upon a hacker but i did see a video of one recently that exploited the game mechanics which made the killer nearly impossible for the killer to catch him
- These "aura orbs" are the only currency to purchase rare clothing which i find... distasteful. So, if you want your survivor or killer to look.... nice. You will need to spend real money.


Overall, the game is pretty fun. The ranking system is fair and the overall enjoyment of the game is great. However, the game is a bit repetitive and i find myself sometimes taking long breaks to fully enjoy the game. I did some things out because I want the person to fully find things out for themselves. Given this game a rating, i would rate this game a 4/5.

Recordáis todas esas películas de terror donde algunos hemos pensado... me gustaría interpretar una película de terror con un asesino en serie, no se si como asesino o como víctima (bueno vale casi que mucha gente como asesino), pues aquí tenéis ese juego. 

Quieres llevar una motosierra para cortar a la gente? Un cuchillo afilado?, o una maza contundente?. Ven, entra en el mundo de "Dead by Daylight", no podrás salir tan fácilmente.

No olvidemos a los supervivientes, correr, saltar, esquivar, esconderse, es frenético, emocionante ( estresa a veces jaja) y cambiante, no deberías perder la oportunidad de probarlo si te gusta la temática.
genial muy bueno este juego osea primero siempre me matan >:v
